quizzes.title: Entertainment Quiz: Movie and Dead
quizzes.description: Test your entertainment knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Entertainment, actor, bela. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: What movie was Leonardo DiCaprios debut?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: This Boys Life

questions.question: You may remember this fictional actor from such films within films as Eenie Meeni Miney, Die, The Revenge of Abe Lincoln or perhaps Good-Time Slim, Uncle Doobie, and the Great Frisco Freak-Out.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Troy McClure

questions.question: Alongside what American actor did Leonardo DiCaprio star in the movie Whats Eating Gilbert Grape?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Johnny Depp

questions.question: Whose face appears at the very end of the film, after the credits roll?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Rick Chance

questions.question: In the movie Shaun of the Dead, what is the main characters weapon of choice?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: a Cricket bat

questions.question: George Romeros classic Night of the Living Dead starts with this line.

options.text: Theyre coming to get you, Barbra!

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Theyre coming to get you, Barbra!

questions.question: With Night of the Living Dead and Dawn of the Dead being the previous two, what is the name of the third instalment in George A. Romeros zombie saga?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Day of the Dead

questions.question: Where are the main characters of the movie Dawn of the Dead hiding from the hordes of the undead?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: a Shopping mall

questions.question: What is the name of the main protagonist of the Resident Evil movie trilogy?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Alice

questions.question: In what movie did Leonardo DiCaprio star alongside Sharon Stone and Russell Crowe?

options.text: The Man in the Iron Mask

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: The Quick and the Dead

questions.question: According to the genre rules, what is the only sure way to kill a zombie?

options.text: Shoot it with a silver bullet

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Cut its head off

questions.question: This black and white classic, starring Bela Lugosi is the first legitimate zombie film ever made.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: White Zombie

questions.question: In the British post-apocalyptic horror movie 28 Days Later, the virus that causes people to become violent zombies is started by what kind of animals?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Chimpanzees

questions.question: In this cult horror flick, directed by Sam Raimy, the dead start to emerge after a tape recording of demonic incantations from The Book of The Dead are played.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: The Evil Dead

questions.question: Which pop legend featured zombies in the video for his song Thriller?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Michael Jackson

options.text: Because Leonardos pregnant mother was looking at a da Vinci painting when he first kicked
Because they admired Leonardo da Vinci
Because his grandfathers name was Leonardo
Because his zodiac sign is Leo

quizzes.title: Entertainment Quiz: Movie and Sport
quizzes.description: Test your entertainment knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Entertainment, john, actor. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: What sport is the subject of the 1986 movie Hoosiers, ranked the 4th best sports movie by the American Film Institute?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Basketball

questions.question: What is the name of the horse saved and trained by Velvet Brown in the 1944 movie National Velvet?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: The Pie

questions.question: What two acclaimed movies are directed by David Lean and produced by Austrian Sam Spiegel?

options.text: Citizen Kane and On the Waterfront
Lawrence of Arabia and The Bridge on the River Kwai
The Graduate and Singin in the Rain

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Lawrence of Arabia and The Bridge on the River Kwai

questions.question: Who directed and starred in the 1941 drama film Citizen Kane?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Orson Welles

questions.question: What was the tagline on the theatrical poster of the 1980 comedy golf movie Caddyshack?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Some people just dont belong.

questions.question: Who produced and directed the 1998 movie Psycho, which is a remake of the 1960 film directed by Alfred Hitchcock?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Gus Van Sant

questions.question: What kind of animal is Marley from the 2008 drama-comedy movie Marley  Me, starring Jennifer Aniston and Owen Wilson?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Dog

questions.question: The 1979 movie Breaking Away, listed as the 8th best sports movie in history by the American Film Institute in 2008, focuses on this sport.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Bicycling

questions.question: John Ford won the 1940 Academy Award for Best Director for the movie adaptation of what Pulitzer Prize-winning novel?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: The Grapes of Wrath

options.text: Father of the Bride Part II

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Fathers Little Dividend

questions.question: The 1941 movie The Maltese Falcon, starring Humphrey Bogart, is based on the novel of the same name by this author.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Dashiell Hammett

questions.question: Which of these actors did not appear in the 1988 baseball movie Bull Durham?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Bruce Willis

questions.question: What type of character does Jennifer Aniston play in the 2009 romantic drama movie Love Happens?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Florist

questions.question: What character did Paul Newman portray in the 1961 movie The Hustler?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Pool player

questions.question: What actor portrayed sports agent Jerry Maguire in the 1996 movie Jerry Maguire?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Tom Cruise

quizzes.title: Entertainment Quiz: Bruce Almighty and Movie
quizzes.description: Test your entertainment knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Entertainment, actor, country. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: What type of woman stands behind every great man according to Bruce Almighty from the self-titled movie?

options.text: A woman who is ready to give up her life for him
A woman saying ‘Don’t say that on TV, honey!’

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: A woman rolling her eyes

questions.question: Alfred Hitchcock directed the 1941 movie Mr. and Mrs. Smith.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: True

questions.question: The AAT appears in two Star Wars movies.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: False

questions.question: What  year did Alfred Hitchcock become a US citizen?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: 1956

questions.question: What word does Bruce Almighty use as an exclamation when he feels happy or ironically when he feels taken in?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Beautiful!

questions.question: What year did British film maker Alfred Hitchcock pass away?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: 1980

questions.question: What actor portrays God in the movie Bruce Almighty?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Morgan Freeman

questions.question: What is Bruces humble comment when the kids admire his jaw-dropping Saleen S7 in the movie Bruce Almighty?

options.text: No, you gotta see my new one.
It gets me from A to B.
This is a necessity, not luxury.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: It gets me from A to B.

questions.question: What was the first question that Bruce asked God at the beginning of the movie ‘Bruce Almighty’?

options.text: Are you there at all, Lord?
God, why do you hate me?
Hello, God, do you copy me?

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: God, why do you hate me?

questions.question: What country banned the movie Bruce Almighty due to pressure from religious groups?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Egypt

questions.question: What is the occupation of Jennifer Aniston’s character, Grace, in the 2003 movie ‘Bruce Almighty’?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Kindergarten teacher

questions.question: What biblical number is emphasized and repeated in the 2003 comedy Bruce Almighty?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Seven

questions.question: What is the name of the Rebels bomber in Star Wars?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Y-Wing

questions.question: What culinary miracle does Bruce Nolan perform in the cafeteria in the comedy ‘Bruce Almighty’?

options.text: He fries an egg with a single look.
He turns the snowfall into marshmallows.
He splits his tomato soup in half.
He transforms a chair into a chocolate cake.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: He splits his tomato soup in half.

questions.question: What sequel to the 2003 movie Bruce Almighty was released in 2007?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Evan Almighty
